ygData.subject: Re: Wood Elf Bard
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Lerri, Never hesitate to post anything on the board or you can email q s straight to me, im open to anything and besides, there is only so much that we can
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Lerri,

Never hesitate to post anything on the board or you can email q's straight
to me, im open to anything and besides, there is only so much that we can
discuss about warriors on this board.


John Zwanenburg
Tips Support/Support Sipt
Tel: (613) 991-3004

> ----------
> From: Elena Glenn[SMTP:braveheart@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 11:12 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Wood Elf Bard
>
> James...Thanks so much for the info. I realize this is a warriors only
> board, but the info here is excellent, and was hoping someone could point
> me in the right direction. Apologies to the people that didn't appreciate
> me posting this on this list. Thanks for the helpful URL's, also.
>
> Leri
>
